name: Prototype Archaic
desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
skill_desc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240%/300%/360%/420%/480% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
